pageContext.claim: “Great statement to Congress by @Jim_Jordan concerning Defunding (not!) our great Police. This Radical Left agenda is not going to happen. Sleepy Joe Biden will be (already is) pulled all the way Left. Many, like Minneapolis, want to close their Police Departments. Crazy!”
pageContext.analysis: The Minneapolis city council proposed to overhaul public safety in the city, which would seek to dismantle the current police force and rethink the law enforcement system from the ground up, but it would not "close" the police department.
